item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0416; 07:54AM; 4633 W August St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tgsiKa; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. The quick interior attack made by firefighters prevented the fire from extended beyond the unit of origin. The primary and secondary searches found no occupants (reported to have exited prior to LAFD arrival). Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E261 E294 E68 E94 RA894 RA94 T26 T61 T94; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0416; 07:38AM; 4633 W August St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tgsiKa; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; Two story, garden style apartment building with smoke showing from the second floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Fire attack made entry and located fire in one unit on the second floor.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E261 E294 E68 RA894 RA94 T26 T61 T94; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0374; 06:46AM; 10968 S Mckinley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BUSxtM; Green Meadows; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was prevented from extending to the adjacent structures. Firefighters are continuing to conduct a thorough search of the property, which was not possible prior to knockdown. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E57 E64 RA264 RA64 RA864 T33 T64; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0374; 06:29AM; 10968 S Mckinley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BUSxtM; Green Meadows; One story, single family dwelling well involved in fire. Firefighters are in the defensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E57 E64 RA264 RA64 RA864 T33 T64; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0315; 05:26AM; 1072 N West Kensington Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hob08s; Echo Park; 100 LAFD firefighters extinguished the flames in 32 minutes. Firefighters found two patients and have evaluated and transported both to the hospital. MEDIA: PIO Captain Branden Silverman en route, ETA 6:10am. LAFD Fire Investigators en route to perform cause investigation.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E11 E20 E201 E203 E209 E211 E220 E227 E35 E89 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA11 RA20 RA27 RA3 RA6 RA803 RA9 SQ21 T1 T11 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Offensive mode.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E11 E20 E201 E203 E209 E211 E220 E227 E35 E89 E9 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA20 RA27 RA3 RA6 RA803 RA9 SQ21 T1 T11 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0097; 01:41AM; 2450 E Whittier Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HqgwSJ; Boyle Heights; Firefighters used defensive tactics (from the exterior only) to battle flames consuming an abandoned one-story commercial building consumed by fire (site of previous burn). It took 24 minutes for 38 firefighters to extinguish the flames using ladder pipes and hand lines. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC18 BC2 E203 E210 E220 E25 E4 E9 RA17 RA25 T10 T20 T3 T9; CH7; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0074; 01:00AM; 3653 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3po56Zz; Exposition Park; Two-story apartment building with fire showing. Offensive mode. Thirty-two firefighters extinguished the flames in 21 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E215 E226 E26 E34 E46 RA15 RA815 SQ21 T15 T26; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange
